A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was great. If you weren't into the messages of the film about moving on from the past and stepping into the future then thats too bad. Its not your Star Wars\, its EVERYONES Star Wars. You dont get to claim ownership of something that belongs to all of us. Rian said it at the end with the shot of that little boy at the end. Its not special people with midiclorians in them that lets you use the force\, anyone can be a Jedi
